description: School can be hard, especially when you haven’t studied. It can seem like the easier option is to just stay home and skip it, but there are always consequences to taking the easy way out. Luckily for Mark, his stepdad isn’t going to let him off the hook so easy! This sexy scruffy stepdaddy has proven time and again that he only wants what’s best for his boy and will do anything to help him out. But he’s got needs, too! In exchange for getting his stepson out of his test, Mark is going to have to give him something in return: his sweet, tight, virgin hole. He seems hesitant and unsure, and watching this young guy take his beefy stepdaddy’s cock up, it seems like he might have rather taken the test! But if you’re anything like me, you’ll love seeing this handsome guy finally get to fuck his boy aggressively and passionately, giving him his bare cock as his stepson squirms beneath him!
title: Playing Hooky RAW
